Description: Annual revenue in USD. Key metric for prioritization.
Current status: Active, Prospect, or Churned.
Score from 0-100 indicating customer health and likelihood to renew (Active customers only).
Foreign key linking to the accounts table.
AI-generated score (0-100) indicating lead quality and conversion probability.
Date of last activity or engagement.
Foreign key linking to the leads table.
Type of interaction: Call, Email, Meeting.
Free text notes summarizing the interaction. Critical for generating talk tracks and understanding sentiment.
Sentiment of the interaction: Very Positive, Positive, Neutral, Negative, Very Negative.
